title: Friendship Hill National Historic Site: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Things To Know Before You Come          Goods and Service Restaurants and basic services are available 3 miles south of the park in Point Marion, PA and 6 miles north in Masontown or Smithfield, PA. Full shopping facilities are available in Morgantown, WV; Uniontown, PA, and Waynesburg, PA. Lodging and Camping There is no lodging at Friendship Hill National Historic Site. Lodging is available nearby in Morgantown, WV, Uniontown, PA, and Waynesburg, PA.
